patthana8.10:1.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ
patthana8.10:1.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.10:1.1_2: nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.10:2.1: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.10:3.1: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.10:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana8.10:6.1_0: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasappaṭigho
patthana8.10:6.1_1: dhammo naappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa
patthana8.10:6.1_2: ca naappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.10:7.1: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.10:8.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte nava,
patthana8.10:8.1_1: aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ,
patthana8.10:8.1_2: kamme …pe… āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte
